name: ax-addass
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c2), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
comment: Addition of complex numbers is associative. Axiom 9 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddass . Proofs should normally use ~ addass instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
